message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we settle at $10,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $10,500 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can we meet in the middle at $8,500?
